English: Hongwu Emperor, also written Hung-wu Ti, reign name of first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang `朱元璋~[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1] (1328-1398), reigned 1386-1398, Temple name `明太祖~[Ming2 Tai4 zu3]
Hongwu Emperor, also written Hung-wu Ti, reign name of first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang `朱元璋~[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1] (1328-1398), reigned 1386-1398, Temple name `明太祖~[Ming2 Tai4 zu3]
